original_text: But to the sons of Kohath he gave none, because they were charged with the service of the holy things that had to be carried on the shoulder.
korean_text: 고핫 자손에게는 주지 아니하였으니 그들의 성소의 직임은 그 어깨로 메는 일을 하는 까닭이었더라

sentences.original_text: But to the sons of Kohath he gave none
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 고핫의 아들들에게 아무것도 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: because they were charged with the service of the holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 거룩한 것들의 봉사를 맡았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that had to be carried on the shoulder.
